nodes.text: This planet located in the Atoan system, in the Ghost Nebula, was covered by tar pits generating oceans of boiling tar. It was inhabited by Atoans from the neighboring planet of Atoa.

A major campaign for the Imperials took place in the system shortly after the creation of the Galactic Empire. The planet was attacked by Darth Vader and the 501st Legion who had been led to believe that they were responsible for the disappearance of Admiral Garoche Tarkin. In actuality, he had defected to Lady Saro, High Priestess of Atoa, one of the rulers of the system.
